channel.title: Derpscape 317
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/QjBNCm2.png[/img][/center]
[center]Welcome to Derpscape! This server is a trading/economy server, with hundreds of customs items, and content that cannot be found elsewhere.[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/lp5fbmI.png[/img][/center]
[center]Homepage: [URL=http://derpscape.com]http://derpscape.com[/URL][/center] [center]Webclient: [URL=http://derpscape.com/webclient]http://derpscape.com/webclient[/URL][/center] [center]Downloadable Client: [URL=http://derpscape.com/webclient/client.jar]http://derpscape.com/webclient/client.jar[/URL][/center] [center]Forums: [URL=http://derpscape.com/forums]http://derpscape.com/forums[/URL][/center] [center]Donate: [URL=http://derpscape.com/donations/donations.php]http://derpscape.com/donations/donations.php[/URL]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/LOYFtek.png[/img][/center]
[center]Features specific to Derpscape:[/center]
[center]-Server has been hosted for 3 years -Server is hosted on a VPS and not a local internet connection -Hundreds of custom items -Server is run by a very mature and open-minded 23 year old rs veteran -stable TRADING economy -Great small community of old school players -Custom Minigames (more to come very soon) -Fixed all of the memory leaks/deadlocks in InsidiaX (there was a ton.) -Custom home area -reworked the skills (cycle based events) -removed player owned shops (unable to find patch for duping methods) -reworked duel arena (removed most duping methods) -reworked Player.java, PlayerAssistant.java, TradeAndDuel.java, and client.java -Custom player Titles (client and server sided) -Custom items protect on death over default item.cfg items -Custom Pets system -Custom Mithril Seeds (planting, picking, viewable by all players) -Website HighScores[/center]
[center]Features from base source:[/center] (InsidiaX, hate away, but I am already aware InsidiaX was a terrible source, and that is why I named it Derpscape because the source started off as this "derpy" piece of crap, but I don't think the same can be said about it now as I have put quite a bit of work into it, removed 100+ coding errors, all of the memory leaks/Deadlocks and have put quite a bit of work into this source.)
[center]-602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters -602 Skill Interface -Fading Hitmarks -Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses. -Combat Icons Next to Damage -All Important Summoning Special Attacks -Very Advanced Dicing System -10Man "Raid" Style Bosses -Nomad -Wilderness Revernants -Custom PK'ing Skill -Elite Slayer Tasks -All NPC's around the World -More Advanaced Skilling than PI -Unique Custom Home -Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging! -100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! -PKP Shops -90% Corrected Item Stats -Even More NPC Anims Added -PERFECT Bridding / Switching -Vote4Cash Integrated -Soulwars Cape & More Items Added -Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect's) -Critical Hits (With RS Hitsplat) -Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated -Instant Loading (Was very slow with base) -Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects -Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces -317 Classic RS Graphics -Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces -NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE -Working Spirit Shield Effects -Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects -Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields -Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother! -Donaters FUNPK Area -Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed Anti Leech (Commented out Exploding) -Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP -Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server -Near Flawless Combat System -Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow -Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild) -Real RS Barrage Orb's for non freezing barrages.[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/LLC7JBL.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Tf0FHwD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7LZfPZV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/aYopky8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DD0591c.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/E5UDs9V.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/aEcBq9H.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/z0gukZC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gnsTNGP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uODzt7V.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/W8rwFxX.png[/img]
[url=http://s1098.photobucket.com/user/derpscape/slideshow/]http://s1098.photobucket.com/user/derpscape/slideshow/[/url]

item.title: Derpscape 317
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

MOST of the people that seem to not like customs are not from the same era of players I originate from, and am trying to attract.

Back in the day, 2005-2007 rsps’s were DOMINATED by customs. This is the true “old school rsps” feel. Check the date in which my account was registered. You will find that I have been a part of Mopar since 2006.

If you don’t like customs, then this server is not for you. I am not bothered by your opinion, but I do believe that if it is a negative one it should be kept to yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Derpscape 317
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Going to give it a try.
I like a server with loads of customs, if it’s done right.

Read full topic

item.title: Derpscape 317
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

I think this freaking great! Lmao! Server done right lmfao. So gonna check this out.

Read full topic

item.title: Derpscape 317
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Custom items can be good if they’re done right. Here, they look like there just aesthetic. They look like they’re done wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Derpscape 317
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

Too much Custom items make me sick , It makes the server look less professional At least in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Derpscape 317
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]Welcome to Derpscape! This server is a trading/economy server, with hundreds of customs items, and content that cannot be found elsewhere.[/center]

[center][/center]

[center]Homepage: [URL=http://derpscape.com]http://derpscape.com[/URL][/center]
[center]Webclient: [URL=http://derpscape.com/webclient]http://derpscape.com/webclient[/URL][/center]
[center]Downloadable Client: [URL=http://derpscape.com/webclient/client.jar]http://derpscape.com/webclient/client.jar[/URL][/center]
[center]Forums: [URL=http://derpscape.com/forums]http://derpscape.com/forums[/URL][/center]
[center]Donate: [URL=http://derpscape.com/donations/donations.php]http://derpscape.com/donations/donations.php[/URL]

[center][/center]

[center]Features specific to Derpscape:[/center]

[center]-Server has been hosted for 3 years
-Server is hosted on a VPS and not a local internet connection
-Hundreds of custom items
-Server is run by a very mature and open-minded 23 year old rs veteran
-stable TRADING economy
-Great small community of old school players
-Custom Minigames (more to come very soon)
-Fixed all of the memory leaks/deadlocks in InsidiaX (there was a ton.)
-Custom home area
-reworked the skills (cycle based events)
-removed player owned shops (unable to find patch for duping methods)
-reworked duel arena (removed most duping methods)
-reworked Player.java, PlayerAssistant.java, TradeAndDuel.java, and client.java
-Custom player Titles (client and server sided)
-Custom items protect on death over default item.cfg items
-Custom Pets system
-Custom Mithril Seeds (planting, picking, viewable by all players)
-Website HighScores[/center]

[center]Features from base source:[/center]
(InsidiaX, hate away, but I am already aware InsidiaX was a terrible source, and that is why I named it Derpscape because the source started off as this “derpy” piece of crap, but I don’t think the same can be said about it now as I have put quite a bit of work into it, removed 100+ coding errors, all of the memory leaks/Deadlocks and have put quite a bit of work into this source.)

[center]-602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters
-602 Skill Interface
-Fading Hitmarks
-Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses.
-Combat Icons Next to Damage
-All Important Summoning Special Attacks
-Very Advanced Dicing System
-10Man “Raid” Style Bosses
-Nomad
-Wilderness Revernants
-Custom PK’ing Skill
-Elite Slayer Tasks
-All NPC’s around the World
-More Advanaced Skilling than PI
-Unique Custom Home
-Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging!
-100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)!
-PKP Shops
-90% Corrected Item Stats
-Even More NPC Anims Added
-PERFECT Bridding / Switching
-Vote4Cash Integrated
-Soulwars Cape & More Items Added
-Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect’s)
-Critical Hits (With RS Hitsplat)
-Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated
-Instant Loading (Was very slow with base)
-Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects
-Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces
-317 Classic RS Graphics
-Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces
-NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE
-Working Spirit Shield Effects
-Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects
-Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields
-Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother!
-Donaters FUNPK Area
-Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed Anti Leech (Commented out Exploding)
-Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP
-Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server
-Near Flawless Combat System
-Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow
-Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild)
-Real RS Barrage Orb’s for non freezing barrages.[/center]

[center][/center]










http://s1098.photobucket.com/user/derpscape/slideshow/

Read full topic
